div.p: Hilda [Hilde] Rothberger wife of Alfred Rothberger, with whom she had two sons and a daughter.

There is substantial correspondence from Hilda Rothberger to Heinrich and Jeanette Schenker dating between 1929 and 1938 as OJ 13/31 (30 items) and OC 38/489, 44/34-35, A/295. She is also frequently mentioned in Schenker's diaries.

Edith Hann, Herrenkleider-Magazin Jacob Rothberger, in: Andreas Lehne, Wiener Warenhäuser 1865-1914, with contributions by Gerhard Meißl and Edith Hann (Forschungen und Beiträge zur Wiener Stadtgeschichte 20, Vienna 1990), pp. 85-122.
Das Jahrbuch der Wiener Gesellschaft 1928, ed. Franz Planer (Vienna 1928), p. 286.
Felix Czeike, Historisches Lexikon Wien, vol. 4 (Vienna 1995), p. 704.
Federhofer, Heinrich Schenker nach Tagebüchern und Briefen... (Hildesheim: Georg Olms, 1985), p. 76.
